CS:GO ist ein zeitloser Klassiker und die Mutter der modernen Shooter.
Das Spiel ist sehr abwechslungsreich, sodass der Spielspaß auch nach langer Spielzeit noch vorhanden ist ( außer man verliert halt oder wird von Schwitzern genoscoped ).
Auch 9 Jahre nach dem Release ist das Game noch relevant und ist allein deswegen immer noch empfehlenswert, weswegen jeder Besitzer eines Steam-Accounts dieses Spiel in seiner Bibliothek haben sollte.

Spent hours watching others play to figure out why can't I aim as well as the others, or react quick enough, but realised many players ain't kosher. Would have really loved the game if it hadn't been for many players having X-ray vision with seeing through walls, roofs, ceilings, smoke etc. When observing some of their 100% aim, seems it's not the better specs but the aim bots. Still play it though, hoping the next game around all the players are on a same level playing field...

Game has a very weak MM system. Most games in match making are against players who doesn't match your personal skills. 10% of players get cought by VAC, some by overwatch patrol. This means half plays with some cheats in sneaky mode.
You may learn nades at maps, prefires, be on upper top of Yprac aiming practice and so on, but if one can't play 12/7 - nothing will improve.
